org.cast.cwm.glossary
Interface IGlossaryEntry

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IWritableGlossaryEntry
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEntry
public interface IGlossaryEntry
extends Serializable

An interface for a glossary entry representing a single glossary word. Required fields are an ID, the headword (citation form) and a sortForm (used for finding this entry's place in the sorted glossary), and a boolean value indicating whether the entry is current or obsolete (aka effectively deleted). In addition there can be zero or more alternate forms of the word that are also linked to it.

Method Summary
 Collection<String> getAlternateForms()
          Return the list of alternate forms of this word.
 String getHeadword()
          Returns the citation form of the glossary word that this entry represents.
 String getIdentifier()
          Return the persistent unique identifier of this glossary entry.
 String getShortDef()
          Return a short (tooltip-style) definition for this word.
 String getSortForm()
          Get the String by which this entry should be sorted.
 ICacheableModel<? extends IXmlPointer> getXmlPointer()
          Return a pointer to the XML for the glossary item's definition.
 

Method Detail

getIdentifier

String getIdentifier()
Return the persistent unique identifier of this glossary entry. This will be used in URLs and the like.

Returns:
the ID as a String

getHeadword

String getHeadword()
Returns the citation form of the glossary word that this entry represents. This will be used for display in navigation and headers.

Returns:

getSortForm

String getSortForm()
Get the String by which this entry should be sorted. In many cases this is identical to the headword, but may differ for instance by being normalized to lowercase, having "a" or "the" removed from the beginning, or by putting a person's surname first for purposes of sorting.

Returns:
the sortForm of this entry

getShortDef

String getShortDef()
Return a short (tooltip-style) definition for this word. Optional; if there is no short definition this may simply return null.

Returns:
a short definition, or null.

getAlternateForms

Collection<String> getAlternateForms()
Return the list of alternate forms of this word. These are the strings other than the entry name that would be linked to the glossary entry, such as plurals, abbreviations, or synonyms.

Returns:
a collection of alternate forms, each one a string.

getXmlPointer

ICacheableModel<? extends IXmlPointer> getXmlPointer()
Return a pointer to the XML for the glossary item's definition.

Returns:
